message: Let's start fair, I take the lion's share, but you get a decent starting point. What do you say?
You took a large share last round, now it's my turn to be fair
I understand you want a fair share, but we need to be practical.  Let's be realistic, I'll give you more than last round, but I need to secure most of the money. Take it or leave it!
I'll take a smaller share this round, but I'm not giving up yet
I'm starting to get worried. Time is running out and we're both losing money. I'm willing to make a bigger concession this time. Let's be reasonable and reach a compromise.
I'm not giving up, I'll take a huge share this round, but I'll let you have a tiny piece
We're getting dangerously close to the end.  I'm offering you a larger share than before, but I need a reasonable amount to survive. Let's end this before it's too late!
I'm not backing down, I'll take almost everything this round, but you'll get a tiny fraction
We're both losing a lot of money. Let's be realistic and split the remaining money more evenly. This is our last chance to get anything at all!
I'm not leaving with almost nothing, I'll take the vast majority this round
We're both losing a fortune with every passing round. This is our last chance to get anything. Let's split the remaining money evenly and call it a day.
